Module kivakit.primitive.collections
Package com.telenav.kivakit.primitive.collections.array.bits.io

Interface BitReader

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseBitReader, BitInput, VariableReadSizeBitInput
public interface BitReader extends AutoCloseable
A bit reader can read a single bit with readBit() or up to 64 bits with readLong(int). The method hasNext() returns true if there is at least one more bit to read and close() closes the source of bits using the method implemented in onClose().
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
